Headline: #151 Sheridan Temporary Reroute at Sheridan/Wilson
ShortDescription: 151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Wilson, Broadway, Montrose, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Wilson.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#151 Sheridan buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Sheridan, Wilson, Broadway, Montrose, and Sheridan due to, street blockage near Sheridan/Wilson.

Allow extra travel time.
